description:
Revitalise your precious lips with these delectable Lucamar Lip Balms that come in cute sliding metal containers.

Pack includes:

Peppermint My Lips Are Sealed Organic Lip Balm

Watermelon My Lips Are Sealed Organic Lip Balm

 

Pure Natural & Organic Ingredients

Lanolin is a deeply moisturising oil that penetrates & seals in moisture.

Our Key ingredient is Lanolin followed by the amazing moisturising and healing properties of organic Shea Butter.

Lanolin used in all our products  is humanely sourced from Australian sheep farmers.

Our Lip Balm is cruelty free and never tested on animals.

Proudly Made In Australia

No Artificial flavouring, parab√©ns, petrolatum, Peg's, Mineral oil, sulphates.

 

Uses include: 

My Lips Are Sealed Lip Balm is versatile

Extreme hydration for dry lips

Dry skin patches

Dry cuticles

A dry sore red nose from a cold or flu

Insect bites

 

Key ingredients:

Pure Australian Lanolin, Organic Shea Butter, Bees Wax, Australian almond oil, Vitamin A and E, Pure Watermelon (Watermelon Balm), Pure Peppermint (Peppermint Balm)
name: Lucamar 1EA
